formalpara.title: NAFCSR.Exceptions.JobClosureCriteria
formalpara.para: Used in the @@FieldAppName@@. Defines exceptions to the general closure criteria (per job type and test module). The syntax for each exception is a comma-separated list of labeled values. Exceptions are semicolon-delimited. For example, the default value is JOB_TYPE:ONT_INSTALLATION,TEST_MODULE:NAF_TopologyValidation,CRITERIA:NONE;.
